text: police have detained a man in his 70s at montreal airport after a suspicious item was found in his luggage for a flight to los angeles , authorities said . the item discovered was n't an explosive but a part of a potential device , said montreal police cmdr. ian lafreniere . the detained man is known to police , lafraniere said , but not for anything related to terrorism . police searched the other passengers and their luggage , looking for a possible accomplice , the police commander said . but none was found . authorities then began searching the man 's home and car , he said , seeking  anything that will make us understand what 's going on .  during the time it took police to secure the area around the man 's home , about 20 people were evacuated from the area . they have all since been allowed to return .
summary: police : the suspicious item is part of a potential device but not an explosive .   the flight the man was going to board was bound for los angeles .   the man in his 70s is known to police but not for terrorism , an official says .   police have searched other passengers and the man 's home .
